metadata.title: CVE-2024-45340 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Credentials provided via the new GOAUTH feature were not being properlysegmented by domain, allowing a malicious server to request credentialsthey should not have access to. By default, unless otherwise set, this onlyaffected credentials stored in the users .netrc file.

criterions.comment: golang-1.13 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
